ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 20th day of November, 2007, the order of the Superior Court is REVERSED. See Commonwealth v. Dickerson, 468 Pa. 599, 364 A.2d 677, 682 (1976) (stating “hearsay evidence is considered valid information in testing probable cause to arrest”); see also Commonwealth v. Stokes, 480 Pa. 38, 389 A.2d 74, 77 (1978); Pa.R.E. 104(a).
